snippet.title: Disney Villains Cursed Café – Nintendo Direct 3.27.2025
snippet.description:
Disney Villains Cursed Café is available today on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.com/us/store/products/disney-villains-cursed-cafe-switch/?utm_source=SW&utm_medium=soytnoa&utm_campaign=A1013-01&utm_id=A1013-01
 
Explore rich visual novel gameplay and get to know an iconic cast of Disney Villains, reimagined with a modern twist!

Disney Villains have come to the counter of the Cursed Café, seeking to procure potions to fulfill their wickedly whims. As the newest potionista of this establishment, you'll mix and serve a variety of magical elixirs that have the power to change the outcome of each villain's story. Aid them with their wants and gather new ingredients to create entirely new concoctions.

Are you ready to stir up some mischief?

#NintendoSwitch #Disney #DisneyVillainsCursedCafe #NintendoDirect

Visit Nintendo.com for more info: https://www.nintendo.com/us/

Subscribe for more Nintendo fun: https://goo.gl/HYYsot

Follow Nintendo of America
X/Twitter: https://twitter.com/NintendoAmerica
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/NintendoAmerica
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/nintendoamerica
Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/nintendo
